bibl.title: Cohortes Cilicum in the Service of Rome.
bibl.note: The Cilices supplied only two cohorts for the Roman auxilia: cohors (I) Cilicum (miliaria equitata sagittariorum), stationed in Moesia, Moesia Superior, Moesia Inferior; cohors I Flavia Cilicum equitata, stationed in Egypt.
Devijver Hubert, Cohortes Cilicum in the Service of Rome.
